title: Smeaton's Gin
tagline: Responsive website for a Bristol Method Dry Gin crafted to a hand-written 1870s gin recipe discovered in the historic Bristol Archives
content1:
After successfully recreating the original Bristol Method Dry Gin found in the Bristol Archives, Smeaton’s decided to refresh the look and feel of their old website.

Smeaton’s wanted a mobile-friendly website that could tell the story about how they recreated the Bristol Method Dry Gin according to the original recipe.

After successfully recreating the original Bristol Method Dry Gin found in the Bristol Archives, Smeaton’s decided to refresh the look and feel of their old website.
content2:
Smeaton’s wanted a mobile-friendly website that could tell the story about how they recreated the Bristol Method Dry Gin according to the original recipe.

They wanted their website to match the branding of their new bottle packaging. They provided artwork that could make their website match their branding.

It has been a challenge to choose the right artwork from hundreds of illustrations. It was important to make sure each illustration featured on the website serves its purpose.
